original_title: Psalty's Songs for Li'l Praisers, Volume 3: Jumpin' Up Joy of the Lord!
overview: The 3rd release in Psalty's "Li'l Praiser" trilogy, showing kids what the true joy of the Lord is. Kids learn how they can have God's joy all the time. The essential concepts of praise and living by faith are presented in a super fun and entertaining way.
tagline: Jumpin' Up Joy of the Lord!
title: Psalty's Songs for Li'l Praisers, Volume 3: Jumpin' Up Joy of the Lord!
